name: Coco Star: Fashion Model
description:
Do you want to be a top stylist?! Introducing Coco Star — the most stylish superstar on the red carpet! Express your unique sense of style with this all new fashion app!
Experience the world of fashion when you style Coco Star for her red carpet debut!

Personalize your 3D Coco Star model and choose from over 200 trendy outfits and accessories! Style Coco Star as you like! Select your favorite eyes, nose, lips and more. You can even choose her hair color and skin tone! Head to the spa to relax and apply professional makeup.

HELLO, Hollywood! Snap a picture of Coco Star, wave to fans and sign autographs! If you love glam style and fashion, this is the perfect app for you!

Features:
√ Be Coco’s chief fashion stylist!
√ Choose from the hottest outfits and fashion accessories! Style Coco Star!
√ Customize Coco’s look — choose her face, eyes, lips, hair, and more!
√ Enjoy SPA time! Relax with Coco Star!
√ Attend movie premieres and watch the stars walk up the red carpet!
√ Say cheese! Take photos of Coco the superstar!
√ Real 3D game! Move and rotate Coco Star as you like!
